Sure, here are some outdoor activities you can do in Banff National Park, Canada:

1. Hiking – Banff National Park has over 1,600 km of hiking trails that offer scenic vistas and stunning alpine views.

2. Canoeing and Kayaking – Rent a canoe or kayak and take a leisurely ride down one of the many pristine mountain lakes.

3. Mountain Biking – Banff's trails offer technical and challenging descents and smooth and flowing sections through the woods.

4. Wildlife Watching – Banff has a huge diversity of wildlife, including grizzly bears, black bears, cougars, wolves, moose, elk, and more.

5. Climbing – Banff offers some of the world's best rock climbing, ice climbing, and mountaineering opportunities.

6. Camping – There are several campgrounds in the park where you can enjoy the beauty of the nature.

7. Skiing and Snowboarding – During winter, Banff offers excellent skiing and snowboarding opportunities in its ski resorts.

8. Snowshoeing – Explore the winter landscape of Banff by going on snowshoeing and discover the quiet beauty of the snow-covered forests.

9. Hot Springs – Relax and soothe tired muscles in the natural hot springs of Banff. 

10. Horseback Riding – Enjoy a leisurely ride through Banff's majestic forests and valleys on horseback.
